title.narrative: Women and youth entrepreneurship development policies and programmes that create decent work and a just transition to envionmental sustainable strengthened

description.narrative: The project will have the following three objectives: Constituents formulate and implement policies and strategies for a just transition towards environmentally and socially sustainable economies; Identify opportunities for, and address constraints to, inclusive and sustainable growth in selected value chains, and facilitate access to financial and non-financial services by young men and women in selected rural geographical areas; and Strengthened capacity of social partners to foster compliance of labour laws and improved working conditions in MSMEs in formal and informal enterprises.

participating-org.narrative: Sweden, Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency

department.narrative: Departement of Partnerships and Field Support (PARDEV)

sector.narrative: ILO Results Framework 2020-2021: Output 4.2. Strengthened capacity of enterprises to adopt new business models, technology and techniques to enhance productivity and sustainability

transaction.ref: TZA/18/51/SWE-2019-TZA102 - Women and youth entrepreneurship development policies and programmes that create decent work strengthened

provider-org.narrative: Sweden, Swedish International Development Cooperation Agency
